title: Symmetry between Series if Entangled by Sums
content: In analogy with entanglement in physics, the concept of entanglement has been developed in mathematics as a symmetry to build upon as a tool to study 'proximity' relations between different number sequences and series in a unifying way. Examples of entanglement are shown. A general algorithm for detecting entangled sequences/series is given in the appendix. The novelty of this paper is to propose the concept of entanglement as a tool to study different sequences and se-ries-series phenomena. To enable useful treatment suggested by Poincar√©.
